hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/ksh echo "--- Deployment ID: ${BUILD_TAG} - ${BUILD_ID}
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "Deployment to devint by Jenkins
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "Component: dai-smsi
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log EXIST_VERS=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/smsi/webapps/safi-smsi-server*/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"` VERSION="4.0.0.1_${BUILD_NUMBER}" print Gathering build version to be deployed print -------------------------------------- print print Deploying version ${VERSION} print print cd /opt/build/scripts print Beginning Deploy update for app from existing version ${EXIST_VERS} to latest package version ${VERSION} ./deployapp.sh -a safi-smsi-server -t dai-smsi -e devint -r ${VERSION} -i smsi -v /opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh dvappdai01 smsi-admin start print dai-smsi-${VERSION} > /var/www/html/devint/dai-smsi.txt print dai-smsi-${VERSION} > /var/www/html/devint/smsi_db.txt echo "URL For Deploy output: console
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "

" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log mv /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/devint.html /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/devint.tmp cat /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/devint.tmp > /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/devint.html rm /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/devint.tmp rm /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log
